summary: GOT Reunions I'm Hope We Get
body:
GOT Reunions I’m Hope We Get

1. Arya and Jon

2. Tyrion and Sansa

3. Bran and Jon

4. The whole Stark family

5. Gentry and Arya

6. The Hound and Arya

7. Bran and Jamie

8. Cersei and Sansa

9. The hound and mountain

Let me know which ones you are looking forward to

Arya Stark: Stupid. Slaves get nothing. Now why...
body:

Jaqen H'ghar: What's in it for me?
Arya Stark: Stupid. Slaves get nothing. Now why don't you take that awful robe off.

summary: Do you think it's possible that will be no winterfell in the end? This fire from leak photos seems pretty bad
question: Do you think it's possible that will be no winterfell in the end? This fire from leak photos seems pretty bad
answer: I think it will be rebuilt. The Starks didn’t fix the damage done by Ramsay so we didn’t get the payoff to Bran’s poignant last moment in ACoK but we might get it by the end of the season. It would be great to see people working on restoring the ancient castle. It would send a message to the viewers that no matter what happens to them, the Starks will keep rebuilding.

reblog.comment: I think it will be rebuilt. The Starks didn’t fix the damage done by Ramsay so we didn’t get the payoff to Bran’s poignant last moment in ACoK but we might get it by the end of the season. It would be great to see people working on restoring the ancient castle. It would send a message to the viewers that no matter what happens to them, the Starks will keep rebuilding.

trail.content_raw: I think it will be rebuilt. The Starks didn’t fix the damage done by Ramsay so we didn’t get the payoff to Bran’s poignant last moment in ACoK but we might get it by the end of the season. It would be great to see people working on restoring the ancient castle. It would send a message to the viewers that no matter what happens to them, the Starks will keep rebuilding.
trail.content: I think it will be rebuilt. The Starks didn’t fix the damage done by Ramsay so we didn’t get the payoff to Bran’s poignant last moment in ACoK but we might get it by the end of the season. It would be great to see people working on restoring the ancient castle. It would send a message to the viewers that no matter what happens to them, the Starks will keep rebuilding.

blog.name: stydialarke
blog.title: I think you look really beautiful when you cry.
blog.description: Expect episode reviews, book reviews, live blogging, and lots of gushing about ships. I will probably mostly post Bellarke or whichever of my shows is currently airing, but I am SUPER multifandom.

title: Ask Game: GoT answers
body:
favorite male character: Jon
favorite female character: Arya!! Honestly, my favorite and most relatable since episode one. I do love Dany a lot too, though.
least favorite character: Probably Cersei. 
prettiest character: Daenerys 
funniest character: Probably Tyrion or Bronn? The Hound is also pretty funny.
favorite season: my favorite season for every individual character is different, honestly. However, I do really like 3, 4, and 6. 
favorite episode: Probably Battle of the Bastards. Just so satisfying.
favorite romantic ship: Gendrya. Gendrya and Braime are really my only two GoT ships, just in case you were wondering. 
favorite family ship: The Starks!! I do think Jaime and Tyrion are underrated, though.
favorite friend ship: I have so many brotps in this show? Tyrion and Bronn, Tyrion and Dany, the Hound and Arya, Jon and Sam. I’m probably also forgetting several others. 
worst ship: J*nsa. I’m sorry, I love them and their relationship, but I don’t see it as romantic. They are brother and sister to me.

summary: Jon, introducing Arya to his new bestie: "This is Gendry. Our fathers were best friends so now we're best friends. Isn't he...
body:
Jon, introducing Arya to his new bestie: “This is Gendry. Our fathers were best friends so now we’re best friends. Isn’t he great?”

Arya, shrugs: “Unimpressive.”

Gendry, smirks: “You just haven’t seen me fight. You don’t know how strong I am.”

Meanwhile, Jon:

Meanwhile, Davos:

summary: How to Throw a Westerosi Wedding Chapters: 1/? Summary:  When Arya Stark agrees to marry Willas Tyrell is prepared for a small...
caption:
How to Throw a Westerosi Wedding
Chapters: 1/?
Summary: 
When Arya Stark agrees to marry Willas Tyrell is prepared for a small wedding. Honestly, she is prepared to just elope. That is before Olenna collapses. On her deathbed the Tyrell matriarch has one request: to be able to give Willas the wedding that the heir of House Tyrell deserves.

Thanks to stupid Stark honor Arya agrees, after all who is she to deny a dying woman a final wish? And who has ever heard of someone pretending to be dying just to manipulate someone into having a large wedding?

summary:
Someone: Arya Stark doesn't want to be a lady, she's just a tomboy and run around like her wolf.
An Intellectual*: Actually what...
body:
Someone: Arya Stark doesn't want to be a lady, she's just a tomboy and run around like her wolf.
An Intellectual*: Actually what Arya ~doesn't~ want to be is a tool for men to use in a society dominated by sexism and patriarchy. She repeatedly reminded people that she was a girl and didn't mind wearing dresses that were pretty - they just weren't useful in her eyes. She became a "boy" to stay alive while her family was being hunted and killed. Moreover she returned to Winterfell as soon as she heard the news from Hotpie.

dialogue.name: Someone
dialogue.label: Someone:
dialogue.phrase: Arya Stark doesn't want to be a lady, she's just a tomboy and run around like her wolf.

dialogue.name: An Intellectual*
dialogue.label: An Intellectual*:
dialogue.phrase: Actually what Arya ~doesn't~ want to be is a tool for men to use in a society dominated by sexism and patriarchy. She repeatedly reminded people that she was a girl and didn't mind wearing dresses that were pretty - they just weren't useful in her eyes. She became a "boy" to stay alive while her family was being hunted and killed. Moreover she returned to Winterfell as soon as she heard the news from Hotpie.
